name: Rulers of Aden
description:
The world of Xanguard has been corrupted by dark and unnatural forces of evil. It is up to you and your team to save Xanguard and become the Rulers of Aden. Let the magical fairy Winkle guide you through the land from city to city defeating evil monsters and difficult bosses. If you are running low on potions and do not want to spend the money, just go ahead and stop at some open water where you can catch a group of krabs and destroy them for potions. Always be on the lookout for hidden treasure you never know where you might find them.

Create your character, choose your class and save Xanguard.
